name: Kyte
description:
Travel distribution is currently dominated by three large players (Amadeus, Sabre & Travelport). These are the Global Distribution Systems (GDSs) who own 99% of the industry. They act as large gatekeepers to flight and hotel travel inventory and charge large upfront fees preventing new travel businesses to arise. 

Airlines are trying to move away from GDSs due to high distribution costs and the lack of a direct connection where they struggle to maximise their revenue from ancillaries (additional services charged at an additional fee). With the GDS most of the customer personal data remain in the hands of middlemen and it is hard for airlines to personalise their content and provide a great shopping experience.

Kyte uses a REST API to integrate directly with airlines to provide rich content (flight and ancillaries) to travel companies of all sizes allowing them to offer the full suite of products that airlines sell on their website today.

jobs.title: Tech Lead
jobs.description:
üëã About Us

Backed by strategic investor easyJet, Kyte is democratising the B2B travel space by giving brands a REST API straight to flight booking. We are creating a win-win situation where larger travel companies sell more and smaller brands avoid a traditional barrier to entry. The support from our sponsors has allowed us to grow quickly but correctly through their funding and expertise.

üí™üèΩ As our Tech Lead you will get involved at the ground level to help us shape the vision for our tech product.

System design - Full lifecycle application design and development of the API design - lead and maintain Kyte‚Äôs backend API
Feed technical considerations into product and business strategy and investment narrative
Oversight of all aspects of engineering including technical strategy and implementing best practices & technology stacks
Taking charge of platform development, owning the engineering budget and making key decisions on technical architecture
Delivering the MVP, enabling us to test, iterate and serve our early customers.
Lead a team in integrating new airlines and customers, react to changing commercial and partner requirements
Define technical support processes and ensure customer support for technical issues
Ensure infrastructure is scalable and can support a large B2B platform
Comfortable in taking part in senior meetings and speaking with investors
üéØ Technical requirements

A track record of delivering well-engineered products that delight users
Knowledge of a range of current cross-platform product development frameworks
Good working knowledge of API designs (e.g. OpenAPI, JSON, JSON-LD, SOAP, XML)
Expertise in Python and nodeJS
High level knowledge of infrastructure: AWS, Kubernetes, Lambda, Redis, ElasticSearch 
Experience with automated deployment and release 

üë§ We hope you agree that these values are essential:

Flexible and adaptable thinking, ability to operate in a lean environment where we prototype and test ideas quickly (and sometimes throw them away)
Entrepreneurial spirit, wanting  to challenge the status quo 
Inquisitive, making sure we are working in the right way and asking questions from a new perspective 
Resilience, an appreciation of failure and what we can learn from this moving forwards 
Proactive, problem solver who thinks creatively 
Appetite for experimenting with new technologies and tools to drive innovation and creativity
A high degree of user empathy and actively seek to test, learn and iterate based on user feedback
Customer Obsessed: highly focussed on understanding customer journeys, pain points and user experience and developing systems and code to delight the customer

ü§òBenefits
Opportunity to work from home, we value your autonomy and trust you to be results focused 
Equity model that rewards you for taking a risk at the start of our journey
Opportunity for travel, when working with airlines and IATA 
Work with 100+ startups in one space at Founders Factory 
Catered lunches on Thursdays and Fridays
Unlimited breakfast, healthy snacks, freshly ground coffee
Bar onsite at our High Street Kensington HQ
